snippet.title: Half-Life: THE INFECTED - Full Walkthrough
snippet.description:
Full Playthough of the Half-Life Mod The Infected in a Single Video with NO Deaths! Take the role of Gerald Backman, an industrial electrician interning at Black Mesa at the time of the resonance cascade. Face off against all the enemies from Opposing Force.
 
★★★ Please SUBSCRIBE, LIKE and SHARE ★★★  Thanks :)

Join us on: 
Discord:►https://halflife.chat
Twitter:► https://twitter.com/Bolloxed_Potato

You can download Half-Life The Infected for free here:
https://www.moddb.com/mods/the-infected/

------------------

Half-Life: Zombie Edition ► https://youtu.be/Et5v2UaKYtQ

Half-Life: Echoes ►► https://youtu.be/fBQKi6vGX8U

Brutal Half-Life              ► https://youtu.be/dKZLne6W6l8
Half-Life: Black Guard  ► https://youtu.be/TexuFifLQbE
Half-Life: Focal Point   ► https://youtu.be/Enz-FItA3yk
Half-Rats: A Fevers Dream ► https://youtu.be/9hRMeiRPKdc
Half-Life: Azure Sheep ► https://youtu.be/64bRQCCNZ7g
Half-Life: Residual Life ► https://youtu.be/fdncoLqmlZo
Half-Life: USS DarkStar ► https://youtu.be/NcpfNnxfaUw
Half-Life: Someplace Else ► https://youtu.be/R093Hsh4BDM
Half-Life: Point of View ► https://youtu.be/-U1rmef9eUI

Half-Life: Poke 646 ► https://youtu.be/U5qO8mzSsgM
Half-Life: Gunman Chronicles ► https://youtu.be/P3f1ooD5nRY
Half-Life: They Hunger 1 ► https://youtu.be/naOqCkVtkZs
Half-Life: Alternative Origin  ► https://youtu.be/weiaJHTmuAc
Half-Life: Freeman's Revenge  ► https://youtu.be/PGncdalOMEI
Half-Life: Deliverance  ► https://youtu.be/kSBdNJVwqgQ
Half-Life: Life's End  ►https://youtu.be/Uwy72G-aumI
Half-Life: Black Ops  ► https://youtu.be/7D-zjSI5LKE

Half-Life: Wanted ► https://youtu.be/R1wpXWvDeqg
Half-Life: Half-Secret ► https://youtu.be/leXbsRYnmTQ
Half-Life: Engineer Adventure Demo ► https://youtu.be/EPaqwCsJf7c

------------------

Half-Life: Opposing Force ► Bootleg Squadrog - https://youtu.be/9ErlM2LrzFA
Half-Life: Opposing Force ► Supernova Space Station - https://youtu.be/3gRLdURhb_s

Half-Life: Opposing Force ► Ultimate Attack - https://youtu.be/fXd7jX2U91Y
